description:
Update metadata of an existing file.  Currently only the name of
the file can be changed.

parameters.description: the new name of the file.
parameters.name: name

path_parameters.description: the slug of the organization the release belongs to.
path_parameters.name: organization_slug

path_parameters.description: the version identifier of the release.
path_parameters.name: version

path_parameters.description: the ID of the file to update.
path_parameters.name: file_id

title: Update an Organization Release's File
